title: 1954년 Philipson 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Philipson. 판결일: 1954-11-10. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Max Philipson v. Utica Knitting Company
**판결일**: 1954-11-10
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 284 A.D. 1023

## 판결문 요약


— Judgment affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment dismissing the complaint in an injunction action by a stockholder.) Present — Vaughan, J. P., Kimball, Piper, Wheeler and Van Duser, JJ. [See 285 App. Div. 858.]
...
